metadata.title: CVE-2015-8854 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The marked package before 0.3.4 for Node.js allows attackers to cause adenial of service (CPU consumption) via unspecified vectors that trigger a"catastrophic backtracking issue for the em inline rule," aka a "regularexpression denial of service (ReDoS)."

criterions.comment: node-marked: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
